mn70:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kasisu carikam carati mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim.
mn70:2.2: Annatra kho panaham, bhikkhave, rattibhojana bhunjamano appabadhatanca sanjanami appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca.
mn70:2.3: Etha, tumhepi, bhikkhave, annatreva rattibhojana bhunjatha.
mn70:2.4: Annatra kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhepi rattibhojana bhunjamana appabadhatanca sanjanissatha appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca”ti.
mn70:2.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
mn70:3.1: Atha kho bhagava kasisu anupubbena carikam caramano yena kitagiri nama kasinam nigamo tadavasari.
mn70:3.2: Tatra sudam bhagava kitagirismim viharati kasinam nigame.
mn70:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena assajipunabbasuka nama bhikkhu kitagirismim avasika honti.
mn70:4.2: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena assajipunabbasuka bhikkhu tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva assajipunabbasuke bhikkhu etadavocum:
mn70:4.3: “bhagava kho, avuso, annatreva rattibhojana bhunjati bhikkhusangho ca.
mn70:4.4: Annatra kho panavuso, rattibhojana bhunjamana appabadhatanca sanjananti appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca.
mn70:4.5: Etha, tumhepi, avuso, annatreva rattibhojana bhunjatha.
mn70:4.6: Annatra kho panavuso, tumhepi rattibhojana bhunjamana appabadhatanca sanjanissatha appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca”ti.
mn70:4.7: Evam vutte, assajipunabbasuka bhikkhu te bhikkhu etadavocum:
mn70:4.8: “mayam kho, avuso, sayanceva bhunjama pato ca diva ca vikale.
mn70:4.9: Te mayam sayanceva bhunjamana pato ca diva ca vikale appabadhatanca sanjanama appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca.
mn70:4.10: Te mayam kim sanditthikam hitva kalikam anudhavissama?
mn70:4.11: Sayanceva mayam bhunjissama pato ca diva ca vikale”ti.
mn70:5.1: Yato kho te bhikkhu nasakkhimsu assajipunabbasuke bhikkhu sannapetum, atha yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn70:5.2: “idha mayam, bhante, yena assajipunabbasuka bhikkhu tenupasankamimha; upasankamitva assajipunabbasuke bhikkhu etadavocumha:
mn70:5.3: ‘bhagava kho, avuso, annatreva rattibhojana bhunjati bhikkhusangho ca;
mn70:5.4: annatra kho panavuso, rattibhojana bhunjamana appabadhatanca sanjananti appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca.
mn70:5.5: Etha, tumhepi, avuso, annatreva rattibhojana bhunjatha.
mn70:5.6: Annatra kho panavuso, tumhepi rattibhojana bhunjamana appabadhatanca sanjanissatha appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca’ti.
mn70:5.7: Evam vutte, bhante, assajipunabbasuka bhikkhu amhe etadavocum:
mn70:5.8: ‘mayam kho, avuso, sayanceva bhunjama pato ca diva ca vikale.
mn70:5.9: Te mayam sayanceva bhunjamana pato ca diva ca vikale appabadhatanca sanjanama appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca.
mn70:5.10: Te mayam kim sanditthikam hitva kalikam anudhavissama?
mn70:5.11: Sayanceva mayam bhunjissama pato ca diva ca vikale’ti.
mn70:5.12: Yato kho mayam, bhante, nasakkhimha assajipunabbasuke bhikkhu sannapetum, atha mayam etamattham bhagavato arocema”ti.
mn70:6.1: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
mn70:6.2: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena assajipunabbasuke bhikkhu amantehi:
mn70:6.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yena assajipunabbasuka bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva assajipunabbasuke bhikkhu etadavoca:
mn70:6.6: “Evamavuso”ti kho assajipunabbasuka bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinne kho assajipunabbasuke bhikkhu bhagava etadavoca:
mn70:6.7: “saccam kira, bhikkhave, sambahula bhikkhu tumhe upasankamitva etadavocum:
mn70:6.8: ‘bhagava kho, avuso, annatreva rattibhojana bhunjati bhikkhusangho ca.
mn70:6.9: Annatra kho panavuso, rattibhojana bhunjamana appabadhatanca sanjananti appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca.
mn70:6.10: Etha, tumhepi, avuso, annatreva rattibhojana bhunjatha.
mn70:6.11: Annatra kho panavuso, tumhepi rattibhojana bhunjamana appabadhatanca sanjanissatha appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca’ti.
mn70:6.12: Evam vutte, kira, bhikkhave, tumhe te bhikkhu evam avacuttha:
mn70:6.13: ‘mayam kho panavuso, sayanceva bhunjama pato ca diva ca vikale.
mn70:6.14: Te mayam sayanceva bhunjamana pato ca diva ca vikale appabadhatanca sanjanama appatankatanca lahutthananca balanca phasuviharanca.
mn70:6.15: Te mayam kim sanditthikam hitva kalikam anudhavissama?
mn70:6.16: Sayanceva mayam bhunjissama pato ca diva ca vikale’”ti.
mn70:6.18: “Kim nu me tumhe, bhikkhave, evam dhammam desitam ajanatha yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tassa akusala dhamma parihayanti kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti”ti?
mn70:7.1: “Nanu me tumhe, bhikkhave, evam dhammam desitam ajanatha idhekaccassa yam evarupam sukham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti kusala dhamma parihayanti, idha panekaccassa evarupam sukham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, idhekaccassa evarupam dukkham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti kusala dhamma parihayanti, idha panekaccassa evarupam dukkham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma parihayanti kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, idhekaccassa evarupam adukkhamasukham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti kusala dhamma parihayanti, idha panekaccassa evarupam adukkhamasukham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma parihayanti kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti”ti?
mn70:8.2: Maya cetam, bhikkhave, annatam abhavissa adittham aviditam asacchikatam aphassitam pannaya:
mn70:8.3: ‘idhekaccassa evarupam sukham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti kusala dhamma parihayanti’ti,
mn70:8.4: evaham ajananto ‘evarupam sukham vedanam pajahatha’ti vadeyyam; api nu me etam, bhikkhave, patirupam abhavissa”ti?
mn70:8.6: “Yasma ca kho etam, bhikkhave, maya natam dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannaya:
mn70:8.7: ‘idhekaccassa evarupam sukham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti kusala dhamma parihayanti’ti, tasmaham ‘evarupam sukham vedanam pajahatha’ti vadami.
mn70:8.8: Maya cetam, bhikkhave, annatam abhavissa adittham aviditam asacchikatam aphassitam pannaya:
mn70:8.9: ‘idhekaccassa evarupam sukham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma parihayanti kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti’ti, evaham ajananto ‘evarupam sukham vedanam upasampajja viharatha’ti vadeyyam;
mn70:8.10: api nu me etam, bhikkhave, patirupam abhavissa”ti?
mn70:8.12: “Yasma ca kho etam, bhikkhave, maya natam dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannaya:
mn70:8.13: ‘idhekaccassa evarupam sukham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti’ti, tasmaham ‘evarupam sukham vedanam upasampajja viharatha’ti vadami.

mn70:8.16: api nu me etam, bhikkhave, patirupam abhavissa”ti?

mn70:10.9: api nu me etam, bhikkhave, patirupam abhavissa”ti?
mn70:11.1: “Yasma ca kho etam, bhikkhave, maya natam dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannaya:
mn70:11.2: ‘idhekaccassa evarupam adukkhamasukham vedanam vedayato akusala dhamma parihayanti kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti’ti, tasmaham ‘evarupam adukkhamasukham vedanam upasampajja viharatha’ti vadami.
mn70:12.1: Naham, bhikkhave, sabbesamyeva bhikkhunam ‘appamadena karaniyan’ti vadami;
mn70:12.2: na panaham, bhikkhave, sabbesamyeva bhikkhunam ‘na appamadena karaniyan’ti vadami.
mn70:12.3: Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahanto khinasava vusitavanto katakaraniya ohitabhara anuppattasadattha parikkhinabhavasamyojana sammadannavimutta, tatharupanaham, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam ‘na appamadena karaniyan’ti vadami.
mn70:13.1: Ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekkha appattamanasa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamana viharanti, tatharupanaham, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam ‘appamadena karaniyan’ti vadami.
mn70:13.3: Appeva namime ayasmanto anulomikani senasanani patisevamana kalyanamitte bhajamana indriyani samannanayamana—
mn70:13.4: yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyyunti.
mn70:13.5: Imam kho aham, bhikkhave, imesam bhikkhunam appamadaphalam sampassamano ‘appamadena karaniyan’ti vadami.
mn70:14.1: Sattime, bhikkhave, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
mn70:14.3: Ubhatobhagavimutto, pannavimutto, kayasakkhi, ditthippatto, saddhavimutto, dhammanusari, saddhanusari.
mn70:15.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa te kayena phusitva viharati pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
mn70:15.4: imassa kho aham, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘na appamadena karaniyan’ti vadami.
mn70:16.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa te na kayena phusitva viharati, pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
mn70:16.4: Imassapi kho aham, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘na appamadena karaniyan’ti vadami.

mn70:17.4: Imassa kho aham, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘appamadena karaniyan’ti vadami.

mn70:22.2: api ca, bhikkhave, anupubbasikkha anupubbakiriya anupubbapatipada annaradhana hoti.
mn70:23.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, anupubbasikkha anupubbakiriya anupubbapatipada annaradhana hoti?
mn70:23.2: Idha, bhikkhave, saddhajato upasankamati, upasankamanto payirupasati, payirupasanto sotam odahati, ohitasoto dhammam sunati, sutva dhammam dhareti, dhatanam dhammanam attham upaparikkhati, attham upaparikkhato dhamma nijjhanam khamanti, dhammanijjhanakkhantiya sati chando jayati, chandajato ussahati, ussahetva tuleti, tulayitva padahati, pahitatto samano kayena ceva paramasaccam sacchikaroti, pannaya ca nam ativijjha passati.
mn70:24.14: Kiva durevime, bhikkhave, moghapurisa apakkanta imamha dhammavinaya.
mn70:25.1: Atthi, bhikkhave, catuppadam veyyakaranam yassudditthassa vinnu puriso nacirasseva pannayattham ajaneyya.
mn70:25.2: Uddisissami vo, bhikkhave, ajanissatha me tan”ti?
mn70:25.3: “Ke ca mayam, bhante, ke ca dhammassa annataro”ti?
mn70:26.1: “Yopi so, bhikkhave, sattha amisagaru amisadayado amisehi samsattho viharati tassa payam evarupi panopanaviya na upeti:
mn70:26.2: ‘evanca no assa atha nam kareyyama, na ca no evamassa na nam kareyyama’ti, kim pana, bhikkhave, yam tathagato sabbaso amisehi visamsattho viharati.
mn70:27.1: Saddhassa, bhikkhave, savakassa satthusasane pariyogahiya vattato ayamanudhammo hoti:
mn70:27.4: Saddhassa, bhikkhave, savakassa satthusasane pariyogahiya vattato rulhaniyam satthusasanam hoti ojavantam.
mn70:27.5: Saddhassa, bhikkhave, savakassa satthusasane pariyogahiya vattato ayamanudhammo hoti:
mn70:27.6: ‘kamam taco ca nharu ca atthi ca avasissatu, sarire upassussatu mamsalohitam, yam tam purisathamena purisaviriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbam na tam apapunitva viriyassa santhanam bhavissati’ti.
mn70:27.7: Saddhassa, bhikkhave, savakassa satthusasane pariyogahiya vattato dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—
mn70:27.8: dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita”ti.
mn70:27.10: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
